synopsis.text: Jiro is an orphan who was found abandoned as a baby and taken in by an innkeeper named Tsuyu. He lives peacefully in the village of Sai until returning home one day to find Tsuyu and her daughter Sayuri murdered. Jiro is falsely accused of the crime when a mysterious dagger is found at the scene. Forced to flee, he meets a priest named Tenkai who is an agent of the shogunate. Tenkai helps Jiro track down and get revenge on the ninja who reportedly killed his adoptive family. Tenkai then takes Jiro under his wing, training him in the ways of the ninja. Years later, Jiro leaves to investigate his true family background, learning that his father had been tasked by Tenkai with finding a clue to Captain Kidd's lost treasure. Whoever possesses this treasure could control Japan's isolationist policies. However, Jiro's father abandoned the mission after falling in love, angering Tenkai who sought revenge. Jiro realizes his path to justice is not over. With only the mysterious dagger from his childhood to aid him, he heads to America in pursuit of the treasure. His goal is to find it before Tenkai's men and return to Japan to avenge his family. The fate of Japan hangs in the balance as Jiro thrusts the Dagger of Kamui toward his ultimate enemy.
